subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[鎌]]}} ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant}} {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of ''<big>鐮</big>''. Also the preferred form for the meaning "[[sickle]]" in Japanese {{w|kanji}})''
* {{l|mul|[[䥥]]}} ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant}} {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of ''<big>鐮</big>'' in mainland China. {{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant}} form of {{l|mul|鎌}} in Taiwan based on {{w|Zhengzitong}} dictionary)''
* {{l|mul|[[镰]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese}})''
